pkgmetadata.longdescription: Random Exercises and Exams Generator // The main purpose of this package is to streamline the generation of exams that include random elements in exercises. Exercises can be defined in a table, based on text and figures, and may contain gaps to be filled with provided options. Exam documents can be generated in various formats. It allows us to generate a version for conducting the assessment and another version that facilitates correction, linked through a code.
